title: ISketchManager.AutoInference
description: Obsolete. Superseded by ISldWorks::GetUserPreferenceToggle or ISldWorks::SetUserPreferenceToggle and swUserPreferenceToggle_e.swSketchInference.
returns: True if automatic inteferencing is on, false if off
remarks: Inferencing mode can be seen when creating a sketch segment and your cursor moves past another sketch enitity. If inferencing is turned on, you see a dashed line from your current cursor position to the inferenced position on the existing sketch entity.
